text: , son of regent Uchisaki, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Edo period (1603–1868). He did not hold regent positions kampaku and sessho. Konoe Motosaki was his son. He also adopted a daughter of Satsuma Shigehide, eighth head of Satsuma Domain, who later became a consort of shōgun Tokugawa Ienari. ==References== * Category:1761 births Category:1799 deaths Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family
title: Konoe Tsunehiro
